member.name: IShellApp.GetAppInfo
member.summary: Gets general information about an application.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that returns the application information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellApp.GetCachedSlowAppInfo
member.summary: Returns information to the application that originates from a slow source. Unlike , this method can return information that has been cached. This method is not applicable to published applications.
member.param: A pointer to a structure in which to return application information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellApp.GetPossibleActions
member.summary: Gets a bitmask of management actions allowed for an application.
member.param: A pointer to a variable of type DWORD that returns the bitmask of supported actions. The bit flags are described in .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellApp.GetSlowAppInfo
member.summary: Returns information to the application that originates from a slow source. This method is not applicable to published applications.
member.param: A pointer to a structure in which to return application information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellApp.IsInstalled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a specified application is currently installed.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: IShellApp
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide general information about an application to the Add/Remove Programs Application. You cannot use it outside the Add/Remove Programs application. The information given by this interface includes a list of supported management actions and whether the application is currently installed.
